name: Rhythmica (itch) (eido201)
description:
Hello My Name is Eyad ( Lord Eido )

I came with Another Game yay!

This game is a music Rhythm Game that I made with my friend.

it may be similar to another game (FNF) , but it is a Demo Version and I want to Add More Stuff in it.

And for Demo Game , I need your feedbacks guys and if there any ideas of some problems face you through your experience.

Don't Forget to Show me your Best Scores :) <3

and if you Love my game and want to Support you can donate me :)
